K01vinv14_u:3: tataḥ śāstrāṇi vigarhitvā saṃghena pṛṣṭaḥ poṣadhaḥ //
K01vinv14_u:5: tac ca poṣadhasūtraṃ madhyamāgame saṃgītanipāte paṭhyate //
K01vinv14_u:9: uktaṃ bhagavatā saṃghasthavireṇa tv ardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśa uddeṣṭavya iti /
K01vinv14_u:13: āyuṣman na (312r1 = GBM 6.936) śuddhā tāvad bhikṣuparṣat* /
K01vinv14_u:20: yatra bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā codayanti smārayanti /
K01vinv14_u:21: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
K01vinv14_u:24: / tasmān na bhikṣuṇā divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ /
K01vinv14_u:25: bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuṃ codayati smārayati sātisāro bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:26: yathā divyena cakṣuṣā evaṃ divyena śrotreṇa /
K01vinv14_u:27: punar apy asāv upadhivārikaḥ saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā kathayati /
K01vinv14_u:33: sthavira katham nāma tvayā saṃghamadhye mama śirasi muṣṭir nipātitā /
K01vinv14_u:34: aho batāhaṃ tvayā ekānte coditaḥ syām iti /
K01vinv14_u:39: saced ekānte codyamāno na smarati smārayitavyaḥ /

K01vinv14_u:70: ime dve adhārmike poṣadhasthāpane dve dhārmike /

K01vinv14_u:75: imāni trīṇy adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni trīṇi dhārmikāṇi /

K01vinv14_u:79: (312v1 = GBM 6.937) samūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
K01vinv14_u:80: imāni catvāry adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni catvāri dhārmikāṇi /
K01vinv14_u:83: amūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /

K01vinv14_u:86: ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni /

K01vinv14_u:92: imāni ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi /

K01vinv14_u:107: amūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa /

K01vinv14_u:119: śikṣāpratyākhyānakathā na (MSV III 112) na viprakṛtā bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:122: śīlavipanno na bhavati na dṛṣṭivipanno nācāravipanno nājīvavipannaḥ /
K01vinv14_u:124: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyamānam* /
K01vinv14_u:125: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:129: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
K01vinv14_u:130: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā /
K01vinv14_u:131: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
K01vinv14_u:132: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya ca poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:136: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kriyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kurvāṇam* /
K01vinv14_u:137: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:142: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
K01vinv14_u:143: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:146: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:150: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ saṃghaḥ pratyākhyāyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ saṃghapratyākhyānaṃ kurvantam* /
K01vinv14_u:151: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:154: evaṃ saṃgho na pratyākhyāto na bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:156: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
K01vinv14_u:157: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:158: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
K01vinv14_u:159: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:163: caturṇāṃ pārājikānām anyatamānyatamām āpattim āpanno bhavati /
K01vinv14_u:164: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
K01vinv14_u:168: dvāṣaṣṭer dṛṣṭigatānām anyatarānyatarāṃ dṛṣṭim anabhiniviṣṭo bhavati /

K01vinv14_u:255: alajjisaṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaḥ saṃvṛtisaṃghaḥ paramārthasaṃghaś ca /
K01vinv14_u:259: yatra na sūtradharo na vinayadharo na mātṛkādharaḥ /
K01vinv14_u:267: tatra ye pūrvakās trayaḥ saṃghāḥ alajjinaḥ saṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaś ca labhyam ebhir adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
K01vinv14_u:268: yo 'yaṃ saṃvṛtisaṃgho labhyam anena dharmasaṃjñinā adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
K01vinv14_u:269: yas tv ayaṃ paramārthasaṃgho na labhyam anenādharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
